boardgame.name: Steam Park
Паропарк
スチームパーク
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As owners of a fantastic steam park, you're to build gigantic, coal-powered rides to attract as many visitors as you can _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but building attractions won't be enough. You'll also need to manage your employees, invest in advertising in order to attract and please the different kinds of guests visiting your park, and, above all, keep the dirt that your park produces under strict control!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Steam Park is an easy-to-learn game with two difficulty levels: one for the less experienced gamers and a more strategic one for those who want a more exciting challenge. In this management game, you'll have to build your own amusement park and make it the largest and most profitable in the region. By constructing the three-dimensional, wonderful rides designed by Marie Cardouat, you will see your park grow right before your eyes. Choose your strategy! Build Stands to attract more Visitors, or Toilets to keep the Dirt under control. Whatever decision you take, take it quickly: The less time you spend planning, the more time you'll have to maintain your park. Thanks to a clever, original action-choosing mechanism, winning in Steam Park is as much a matter of being the best as of being the fastest!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #09: Among The Stars: Revival, Steam Park on tap, Mottainai, Two Rooms _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; A Boom
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2013 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: DJ113: Steam Park (2013) Aureliano Buonfino + Lorenzo Silva + Lorenzo Tucci Sorrentino
Episode 14: Steam Park/Gaming Resolutions and Predictions
Episode 21: Steam Park, Gloomhaven, This War of Mine, Ascension, Stop Thief!
Episode 72 March Craziness Dice Game Style Part 1
The Board Game Review Room: Steam Park
The Game Pit: Episode 15.1 - Council Chamber Essen Review

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** STEAM PARK: $27.95 Iello [IEL STEAM] Publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Anticipated Release Date: Early January *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD

Signed by designer Lorenzo Silva and artist Marie Cardouat inside box lid; includes hand-drawn Marie Cardouat illustration (see image). A little whitening on the box corners due to travel home from Essen. FedEx shipping is typically $6-13 in the US. Will combine shipping on multiple games. Feel free to ask for a quote (and to ask about any Essen games not yet for sale). Local pickup in the DC metro area can be arranged.

IELLO (IEL51123) As owners of a fantastic steam park, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re to build gigantic, coal-powered rides to attract as many visitors as you can - but building attractions won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be enough. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll also need to manage your employees, invest in advertising in order to attract and please the different kinds of guests visiting your park, and, above all, keep the dirt that your park produces under strict control! Steam Park is an easy-to-learn game with two difficulty levels: one for the less experienced gamers and a more strategic one for those who want a more exciting challenge. In this management game, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to build your own amusement park and make it the largest and most profitable in the region. By constructing the three-dimensional, wonderful rides designed by Marie Cardouat, you will see your park grow right before your eyes. Choose your strategy! Build Stands to attract more Visitors, or Toilets to keep the Dirt under control. Whatever decision you take, take it quickly: The less time you spend planning, the more time you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to maintain your park. Thanks to a clever, original action-choosing mechanism, winning in Steam Park is as much a matter of being the best as of being the fastest!

Thanks to a clever, original action-choosing mechanism, winning in Steam Park is as much a matter of being the best as of being the fastest!
